nametypes.name: CHILD
nametypes.description: Child Data Hierarchy - lowest level in the hierarchy tree

nametypes.name: PARENT
nametypes.description: Parent Data Hierarchy - middle level containing child entries

nametypes.name: GRANDPARENT
nametypes.description: Grandparent Data Hierarchy - top level containing parent entries

grandparents.name: NOTE
grandparents.description: Additional notes provided in the authors voice

grandparents.description: This tag is used to identify the additional utilization of a term in a different language

grandparents.name: RESTRICTIONS

grandparents.name: STYLING

grandparents.name: USER
grandparents.description: This tag is used to identify the user of the documentation

grandparents.name: NOTES
grandparents.description: This tag is used to identify any additional important notes about the corresponding data

parents.name: ASPERDEFINED
parents.description: Reference is in context to traditional definition

parents.name: OBJECTIVEACCEPTANCE
parents.description: A statement or claim that is obvious in nature, understandable without further explanation, while still technically sound is disputable, dispute would disqualify users intelligence
